ï»¿I got into climbing during college.
I just like to go into the woods and have a reason to be there...
I've been climbing like a year and a half.
I like that it forces to have this Zen state.

Our weekends usually begin Friday at about 3 PM.
We decide on the goal, collect some friends, climb until sunset...
